name: Gravity Crush
description:
"Steal a powerful device which will litterally knock the ground out from under you!"

xMasterSpy69x was notorious in the espionage scene. He never finished a job right. But he was also cheap and some people appreciate that in a thief. A contractor approached him, his biggest job yet. Should he manage to steal a powerful device from one of the biggest tech-companies for the notorious Mr. Johnson - then that would be his biggest breakthrough. As it turns out, it literally would be.

WARNING: Pressing Escape kills you and ends your run (yes I did not have time to build a pause screen…)

DISCLAIMER:

This game was made within 72 hours for the Ludum Dare GameJam 51!

PostJam Fix should get rid of the UI bug that continue is not clickable for some people. (If it still isn't clickable pressing ESC or ENTER should work)

There is no end to the game, but new content to be found until at least level 60!

Credits:
A game by: AndideBob
Graphics by: ToastiChron
Music by: Andrew Sitkov
